paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data from affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The genetic analysis of BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes in this patient revealed the germline pathogenic variant c.2808_2811delACAA p.(Ala938ProfsTer21) in heterozygosity.
The BRCA2 pathogenic variant was also investigated in the patient’s two sons (IV.8, IV.9), who inherited the same BRCA2 pathogenic variant.
The BRCA2 pathogenic variant was also investigated in the patient’s two sons (IV.8, IV.9), who inherited the same BRCA2 pathogenic variant.

functional_data.summary: The pathogenic variant results in a premature termination codon predicted to cause a truncated or absent BRCA2 protein due to nonsense-mediated decay.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the family.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on familial segregation and population frequency.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is known to be one of the most common pathogenic variants in non-Ashkenazi Caucasians.
key_quotes: The genetic analysis of BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes in this patient revealed the germline pathogenic variant c.2808_2811delACAA p.(Ala938ProfsTer21) in heterozygosity.
This variant is known to be one of the most common pathogenic variants in non-Ashkenazi Caucasians.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding BRCA2 variants and penetrance were successfully extracted.
